data.title: The Coral House Homestay
data.content: Pratibha & Sanjay have opened their delightful home to guests. There are 6 charming, colourfully-decorated rooms, and lovely shaded courtyards in which to relax and chat with the family and other guests. Delicious, home-cooked meals are served. The location is ideal, being in a quiet residential colony close to the Taj Mahal.
